name: LeBron James
description: 6'9" forward, physical specimen. 4 championships, 4 MVPs, all-time leading scorer. From Akron to global icon. The King.

chalk-toss.name: Chalk Toss
chalk-toss.description: Pre-game ritual - tossing chalk into the air
chalk-toss.prompt: standing at scorer's table tossing chalk powder into air - head tilted back, arms raised releasing chalk cloud, eyes closed in moment of preparation, pre-game ritual that signals dominance is coming
chalk-toss.energy: ritual power, the king preparing for battle

tomahawk-dunk.name: Tomahawk Dunk
tomahawk-dunk.prompt: massive tomahawk dunk in progress - ball cocked back behind head with one arm, body rising toward rim, face showing explosive power and intensity, freight train that cannot be stopped

silencer.name: The Silencer
silencer.description: Hand to ear after clutch shot in hostile arena
silencer.expression: taunting confidence, shutting up the crowd
silencer.prompt: cupping hand to ear toward crowd after big shot - slight smirk, looking at hostile fans, silencing the doubters and haters, I can't hear you now gesture, road warrior triumph

block-from-behind.name: The Block
block-from-behind.description: 2016 Finals Game 7 - Chasedown block on Iguodala
block-from-behind.prompt: leaping from behind to pin shot against backboard - arm fully extended, body stretched horizontal, coming from nowhere to make impossible block, the play that saved a championship

arms-spread.name: Witness
arms-spread.description: Arms spread wide - 'You are witnessing greatness'
arms-spread.prompt: standing with arms spread wide to sides - chest out, head high, declaring greatness to the world, 'witness' pose, the king surveying his kingdom after dominant performance
arms-spread.energy: declaring greatness, king of the court

lefty-finish.name: Lefty Finish
lefty-finish.prompt: contorting body for left-handed layup through defenders - absorbing contact, arm extended to basket, incredible body control, finishing with either hand equally deadly
